item.title: Version 1.1.18
item.description:
What’s New (v1.1.18+46) • Added Top Deals view for full visibility of deal performance, including rankings, operator breakdowns, and detailed deal modal. • Improved navigation with faster app launch (1–1.5s) and login (3–4s).
Fixes & Enhancements • Updated Previous Year and Current Year calculations for countries and operators using Charge Net. • Growth % now follows updated rules, including proper handling when Previous Year = 0.

item.title: Version 1.1.17
item.description:
What’s New in v1.1.17+45 1.Active scenario shown on Settings page 2.Operator & alliance info listed with active periods 3.Only deals from the selected scenario are displayed 4.Unified number formatting: 4–6 digits → full number 7–9 digits → M (2 decimals) 10–12 digits → B (2 decimals) 5.“Clear All” button added to deal status filter
Fixes: 1.Corrected country deal counts 2.Faster login (2–5s) 3.Days to expire calculation fixed, including leap years 4.Standardized deal card formatting
